hero.subheadline: Custom designs crafted with precision. From fine line work to bold statement pieces, we bring your vision to life with exceptional artistry.
hero.imageAlt: Professional tattoo artist at Red Point Tattoo working on detailed custom design

portfolio.subtitle: Every piece tells a story. Browse our latest custom tattoos and see the artistry that sets Red Point apart.

sessions.subtitle: Choose the perfect session for your tattoo vision. All sessions include consultation, custom design, and aftercare guidance.
sessions.guarantee: 100% satisfaction guaranteed or your deposit back

testimonials.quote: Alex created the most incredible sleeve for me. The attention to detail and artistic vision exceeded all my expectations. Couldn't be happier!
testimonials.author: Sarah Thompson

testimonials.quote: Professional, clean, and incredibly talented. The custom design process was collaborative and the final result is a true masterpiece on my skin.
testimonials.author: Marcus Chen

paragraphs: With over 8 years of experience in the tattoo industry, Alex Martinez founded Red Point Tattoo with a vision to create exceptional custom artwork that tells each client's unique story. Specializing in fine line work, geometric designs, and photorealistic portraits, Alex combines technical precision with artistic innovation.

Every tattoo at Red Point is a collaborative journey. We believe in taking the time to understand your vision, refining it through detailed consultations, and executing it with meticulous attention to detail. Our North London studio provides a comfortable, professional environment where art comes to life.
about.callout: "Every tattoo should be a masterpiece that you're proud to wear for life."
about.imageAlt: Alex Martinez, lead tattoo artist at Red Point Tattoo, working on a detailed custom design

items.question: How far in advance should I book?
items.answer: We recommend booking 2-4 weeks in advance, especially for larger pieces. Rush appointments may be available for smaller tattoos - just give us a call to check availability.

items.question: What's included in the consultation?
items.answer: Your consultation includes design discussion, placement advice, sizing recommendations, and a detailed quote. We'll also cover aftercare instructions and answer any questions about the tattooing process.

finalCta.headline: Ready to Start Your Tattoo Journey?
finalCta.subheadline: Book your consultation today and let's create something extraordinary together.

booking.modalDescription: Tell us about your tattoo vision and we'll get back to you within 24 hours to schedule your consultation.
booking.successMessage: Thanks for your interest! We'll review your request and get back to you within 24 hours to confirm your consultation time.
booking.depositDisclaimer: A £50 deposit will be required to secure your appointment
